channel.title: Parinoed
channel.description: Ok I need help with something. Im really scared (LOL) of runnin scripts without me watching them. If anyone could give me advice on what to do and what scripts to use if to run for a long time...

item.title: Parinoed
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

well usually you take your nick from the middle of the username so you don’t have to deal with uppercase. For example, say the username was ‘Username’, then a good nick would be ‘ser’ or ‘name’, or ‘erna’. I’d try to stay away from uppercase.
Just my 3 cents.

Read full topic

item.title: Parinoed
item.dc:creator: @minitual minitual
item.description:
@minitual wrote:

I’m not at a Scar terminal at the moment so I’m pulling all this off the top of my head. So, if I get something horribly wrong, that’s why.
First, don’t you have to create NickNameBMP:=CreateBitmapMaskFromText(UserNick,UpChars) (Sorry if the syntax and everything was real wrong) so SRL knows what bitmap it’s looking for so it can find your name?
Second, don’t you need to have the first letter of your UserNick capitalized in the script; otherwise, the bitmap will look like zezima instead of Zezima and SRL won’t be able to find it?
Those are just my thoughts and I’m probably really wrong but if you’re still having trouble, just maybe look through what I said and see if you can figure anything out. Also, go through real successful scripts by WTFak and so on to see what they’re doing differently.
Just my 2 cents.

Read full topic

item.title: Parinoed
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“junior, post:10, topic:13460”]at the moment im making the sickest willow cutter and banker and it works fuckin awesome(thanks to all the people that helped cough cheesehunk cough)… findnormalrandoms; procedure is in all my procedures… ill try it with a short nick and see if that works.
thanks again
~jR[/quote]
The thing is, with Every wait, and stuff, it could miss a talking random. Talking only stays up for about 2/3 of a second, so Talking randoms need to be checked very often, so it doesn’t miss ANYTHING! That’s why FTWait; was made, and FTFlag; Look in some of the latest Fakawi, Wizzup, or Dankness scripts for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Parinoed
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Try something shorter. That seems a little long. Try “anm.”
Also, for future reference, remember that your NickName cannot contain capital letters, or spaces. What script are you using? Maybe it is not doing random checks often enough, and it isn’t finding the talking randoms…

Read full topic

item.title: Parinoed
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

tonekray:

I know but ive seen SRL antis work and for some reason it would never catch talkin randoms… never click em… never do anything. Mostly none of the anti randoms for me work besides the box random.

im having the same problems and its pissing me off!
and i do set up me characters nick name… is this right?

[scar]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := ‘scuanmii’; //Username //////
Players[0].Pass := ‘BLANK’; //Password //////
Players[0].Nick := ‘uanmi’; //3 or 4 letters username //////
Players[0].Loc := ’ ‘; //Leave as blank //////
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp //////
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’); //////
end; //////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Parinoed
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

hmm. just make them run for a certani ammount of time.
Something like this
MarkSystem
If tiemefrommark>30000 then
Logout;
Termiantescript

that would only run for a given ammount of time and then log you out. =)
